metadata.name: Azure DevOps PR Reviewer
metadata.description: Comprehensive PR review with security, test enforcement, and package scanning. Settings are loaded from .env file in the project directory.

notes.configuration: The start_server.py wrapper ensures .env file is loaded properly
troubleshooting: If authentication fails, run: python test_auth.py
PAT token must have Code (Read & Write) and Pull Request (Read & Write) permissions
